message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. I believe you'll find it a worthwhile investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can you consider a price closer to that?

I understand you're looking to negotiate, Bob. I can see you're willing to make a serious offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to consider $950000? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1010000.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $980000? That's the absolute maximum I can go.
